articles.title: Kelly Rowland Appears to Clash With Cannes Red Carpet Usher After Being Rushed Up the Stairs at ‘Marcello Mio’ Premiere - Variety
articles.description: Kelly Rowland was on the Cannes red carpet for the premiere of 'Marcello Mio’ when an usher appeared to forcefully direct her up the stairs.
articles.content:
Kelly Rowland appeared to admonish an usher on the Cannes red carpet on Tuesday evening after being rushed up the stairs by staff at the festival.
